    • 构造器详细资料

      • ExtraBallTicketService

        public ExtraBallTicketService()

    • 方法详细资料

      • enquiry

        public BaseTicket enquiry(Context<?> respCtx,
                 BaseTicket clientTicket,
                 boolean fetchEntries)
                   throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: TicketEnquiryService
        Enquiry a ticket with a specified ticketSerialNo. The implementation must check if the ticket is multiplDraws, if so, implementation should assemble one LottoTicket instance from multiple LottoTicket records.
        • The gameDraw of returned ticket must be the oldest draw in all tickets with same serialNo
        • The value of multipleDraw should be the size of ticket list with same serialNo
        指定者:
        enquiry 在接口中 TicketEnquiryService
        参数:
        respCtx - Context of transaction.
        clientTicket - LottoTicket data transfer object, the following components of this arguments must not be null: serialNo
        fetchEntries - Whethere needs to fetch all associated entries?
        返回:
        a ticket of type(com.mpos.lottery.te.gameimpl.lotto.sale.domain.LottoTicket) with given serialNo.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • sell

        public java.util.List<? extends BaseTicket> sell(Context<?> respCtx,
                                        BaseTicket clientTicket)
                                          throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: TicketService
        Save a ticket. If the ticket is multlpleDraw, the multiple records will be saved. Before save a ticket, below condition will be checked:
        • The game draw is open for sell ticket(game draw isn't inactive, and current time is between startSellingTime and stopSellingTime).
        • The format of selectedNumber is legal.
        • Ignored: The totalAmount is right
        • Check credit level
        指定者:
        sell 在接口中 TicketService
        参数:
        respCtx - Context of transaction.
        clientTicket - LottoTicket data transfer object, the following components of this arguments must not be null: gameInstance.gameId, gameIntance.drawNo,totalAmount, entries.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • cancelByTicket

        public boolean cancelByTicket(Context<?> respCtx,
                     BaseTicket clientTicket)
                       throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: TicketService
        Cancel a ticket with specified serialNo. After cancellation, the status ticket should be 'canceled'. If ticket is multipleDraw, all tickets with this serialNo will all be set to 'canceled'.

        However Controller shouldn't call this service directly, it should call TransactionService.reverseOrCancel(Context, BaseTicket) instead.

        指定者:
        cancelByTicket 在接口中 TicketService
        参数:
        respCtx - Context of transaction.
        clientTicket - LottoTicket data transfer object, the following components of this arguments must not be null: serialNo
        返回:
        true if the cancel is declined, otherwise false will be returned.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • cancelOrReverse

        public boolean cancelOrReverse(Context<?> respCtx,
                      Transaction targetTrans)
                        throws ApplicationException
        A implement of cancel by transaction.
        指定者:
        cancelOrReverse 在接口中 ReversalOrCancelStrategy
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of cancellation request.
        targetTrans - The transaction which is intended to be cancelled.
        返回:
        true if cancel declined, or false.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • assembleMultiplDrawTickets

        protected java.util.List<ExtraBallTicket> assembleMultiplDrawTickets(ExtraBallTicket ticket,
                                                         java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> gameInstances)
                                                              throws ApplicationException

      • assembleEntries

        protected void assembleEntries(ExtraBallTicket ticket,
                   java.util.List entries)
                        throws ApplicationException
        Save lotto/racing.... entries of ticket. Before saving, the identifier of entry should be assigned.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException

      • lookupGameInstance

        protected java.util.List<? extends BaseGameInstance> lookupGameInstance(Context respCtx,
                                                            ExtraBallTicket ticket)
                                                                 throws ApplicationException
        Check if game draw exist, then the transaction will be accepted only below two conditions if fulfilled:
        • current time is between start selling time and stop selling time.
        • the game draw is not inactive.
        参数:
        ticket - The sold ticket.
        返回:
        the required future game instances, they are ordered by stop selling time.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.
